name: POZAVAROVALNICA SAVA
description: The Sava Insurance Group is one of the leading insurance groups based in the Adriatic region, with a presence in six countries of the region. Pozavarovalnica Sava d.d. (Sava Re) is the parent company of the Sava Insurance Group and a reinsurance company headquartered in Ljubljana, Slovenia. The Group is a provider of insurance, asset management, pension and related solutions.Â
